title: Moving big trees
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures and Pathe Pictures
brief_description: The Civic Trust (London) works to redress the loss of trees (generally due to urbanization and other development) by cheap and simple means. Describes the process from selection and preparation of trees to relocation.
description: The Civic Trust (London) works to redress the loss of trees (generally due to urbanization and other development) by cheap and simple means. Describes the process from selection and preparation of trees to relocation.
